Text: ROOM CHANGE BRM Hexagon Meeting Allen Center Conf Room C Cc PST Please note that todays meeting as well as the meeting will both be held in AC C Optional invitees for calendar purposes only Forwarded by Cathy Jo AllenHOUEES on AM on PM To cc Subject Risk Management Simulation I want to give you an update on the progress of the Risk Management Simulation project since you were unable to attend Tuesdays kickoff meeting This is the presentation we went through at the meeting See attached file SMEKickoffppt We also demonstrated a simulation for everyone Yevgeny Frolov has a demonstration CD with a minute selfrunning simulation demo if you would like to view it please contact him Here are the NEXT STEPS Attend the two Hexagon Sessions sessions to design the simulation model or engine Tuesday September Room C Allen Center dinner provided Monday September Room C Allen Center If you can only attend one please do We need your help Schedule one hour individual meeting between September and Please email to set up these meetings Prepare for individual meeting by reviewing attached document See attached file Agenda First Mtgdoc Thank you for your time We look forward to seeing you on the th Don Barnhart SMEKickoffppt Agenda First Mt doc Embedded Picture Device Independent Bitmap
